## mergeFnWithPromiseFn type

兼容普通函数和`promise`<!-- -->函数类型

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type mergeFnWithPromiseFn<T = unknown, P extends any[] = any, isP extends boolean | undefined = undefined> = isP extends undefined ? fn<P, T> | promiseFn<P, T> : isP extends true ? promiseFn<P, T> : fn<P, T>;
```
**References:** [fn](./types.fn.md)<!-- -->, [promiseFn](./types.promisefn.md)

## Example


```ts
type f = mergeFnWithPromiseFn<void, [string, number]> // fn<[string, number], void> | promiseFn<[string, number], void>

type f = mergeFnWithPromiseFn<void, [string, number],false> // fn<[string, number], void>

type f = mergeFnWithPromiseFn<void, [string, number],true> // promiseFn<[string, number], void>
```
